Little_Rock.Johnson House (514 East 8th Street, Litt: The Johnson House is a historic house at 518 East 8th Street in Little Rock, Arkansas. It is a 2-1/2 story American Foursquare style house, with a flared hip roof and weatherboard siding. Its front facade is covered by a single-story porch, supported by Tuscan columns, and the main roof eave features decorative brackets.
